body_html:
@oorlov //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so was missing a couple of link targets in 0.12 that provide the necessary definitions. This has since been fixed, but if you want to patch 0.12 just add:

        "-llog",
        "-lm",

to the linkopts section and it should build.
body_text:
@oorlov //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so was missing a couple of link targets in 0.12 that provide the necessary definitions. This has since been fixed, but if you want to patch 0.12 just add:
        "-llog",
        "-lm",

to the linkopts section and it should build.
body:
@oorlov //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so was missing a couple of link targets in 0.12 that provide the necessary definitions. This has since been fixed, but if you want to patch 0.12 just add:

```
        "-llog",
        "-lm",
```

to the linkopts section and it should build.
